# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="b5557-102">在 Outlook.com 中回復</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b5557-103">若要一次回復一封郵件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b5557-104">在郵寄清單中，選擇您要回復的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="b5557-105">在郵件窗格的右上方，選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="b5557-106">**回復**或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="b5557-107">**全部回復**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="b5557-108">輸入您的訊息，然後選取 [**傳送**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b5557-109">若要自動回復所有郵件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b5557-110">跳至</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="b5557-111">**設定** > **查看所有 Outlook 設定** > **郵件** > 的**自動回復**開啟[自動回復設定](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="b5557-112">選取 [開啟自動回覆]\*\*\*\* 切換開關。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="b5557-113">選取 [**僅在時間週期內傳送回復**] 核取方塊可讓您：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b5557-114">只在選擇時傳送回復。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b5557-115">如果您未設定時段，您的自動回復會保持開啟，直到您將它關閉為止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b5557-116">封鎖您的行事曆</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b5557-117">自動拒絕新的邀請</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b5557-118">在這段期間拒絕並取消我的會議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="b5557-119">在 [消息] 方塊中，輸入您離開時要傳送給人員的訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="b5557-120">若只要將回復傳送給您的連絡人，請選取 [**僅傳送對連絡人的回復**] 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="b5557-121">選取 **[儲存]**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b5557-122">若要深入瞭解，請參閱[Outlook.com 中的自動轉送](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b5557-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
